name: ZeroSpace
description:
A role playing space trading game where you travel the galaxy interacting and trading with planets.

In the (near) future:

Combat system: Inspired by naval warfare games. Ship upgrades & customization.

Dynamic economy: More tradeable items, new trading interface

Unravel the galaxy's mysteries: Discover new peoples and exotic organisms - help them, destroy them, or both! Witness the effects of your actions.
